728799f-a.folder: Douglas Road & Emerson Drive, Staten Island, NY
728799f-a.text:
(1)
Douglas Road, north side, between Emerson Drive and Milden Ave., showing the Philosopher's Retreat, a log cabin built by direction of C.0. Kolff on his psoperty. It was destroyed by fire in 1917. For additional data see "The New York Times', February 4,
1917, section 3, page 4.
November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr.
(2)
A view from the opposite direction.
November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
(3)
An additional view at a later date.
August 31, 1913.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
